name: npm-babel-prettier
description: Some common build tasks written with npm scripts.
author: Des Barrett

scripts.uglify: mkdirp dist/js-min && uglifyjs dist/js/*.js -m -o dist/js-min/app.js  && uglifyjs dist/js/*.js -m -c -o dist/js-min/app.min.js && echo 'success'
scripts.icons: svgo -f src/images/icons -o dist/images/icons && svg-sprite-generate -d dist/images/icons -o dist/images/icons/sprite.svg
scripts.build:css: npm run lint-scss && npm run scss && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.build:js: npm run babel:js && npm run lint && npm run uglify
scripts.build:images: npm run imagemin && npm run icons
scripts.build:all: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:images
scripts.postinstall: npm run build:all && npm run watch:all
